Reviews.Title: this is an awesome camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Kat
Reviews.Content: is this the coolest camera or what? maybe i'm just like this cuz my other camera was really cruddy...but this rocks! it focuses before it takes the pic (unless you go to settings and put it on the setting to make it take it right away). i haven't used the waterproof feature yet, but is that awesome or what?!the things i dont like:the only colors you can do is 'color' and 'b&w;'when you stop the video, it cuts off the very endit takes awhile to turn the volume up or down, having to go to menu then settings.the things i do like:it zooms wayy upthere are lots of cool features and effects you can do, even crop it and make it look like a watercolor!it takes really clear pixit has lots of settings for taking pictures.it has a nice big screen and when you zoom up the lens (there is an internal one) goes out instead of making it look all pixelyfor videos, while you're taking it, it will zoom up if you press 'T' and when you replay it, you can hear it.yeah, there are a few things i can't stand. but for the most part, i adore this camera and am known to often go around the house saying "have i mentioned i love my camera?" and mom always answers "yeah, you may have mentioned that a few times..."LOVE IT!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Used it for about 2 years now
Reviews.Author: G. Matot "GMS"
Reviews.Content: So this is an easy and somewhat rugged point-and-shoot camera. I got this model for a river raft trip on the Colorado River where exposure to water and sand was likely. It never did get soaked but that gave me piece of mind. I would not test it in the ocean on your vacation.Pros: small size - smaller than a pack of smokes, ease of use, simple settings, reliable, waterproof (perhaps), takes SDHC cards, easy to conceal, includes wrist strap, has some special effect shooting modes, self timer, macro mode, tripod mountable. Tiny size and smooth rounded corners means it fits and carries in your pocket just fine and slides out quickly for a fast shot. Shoots decent standard def video too, a few steps above VHS quality video but with poor low lite video performance.Cons: rechargeable battery (can go dead when needed most but with AA's you pop in new ones and re-start shooting in seconds), viewfinder only on LCD display - sunlight washes out any hope of seeing what you are shooting, a little slow to process, digital zoom - not optical means any zoom reduces picture quality, small size makes it harder to hold steady, LCD forces you to hold at eye-ball height with makes for some awkward shots. And it plays the stoopid Fuji sound each time you turn it on which makes it harder to take stealth photos.So I also own an expensive Canon camera but bring this along on vacations instead because it doesnt take up much room, isn't a target of thieves - looks like a tiny cheap camera, waterproof means it survives the change from a cold dry hotel room to a humid outdoors with minimal risk of condensation damage. When viewing images on the computer, after the 2nd click to zoom into the 10mp images they start to pixel on the 3rd zoom-in click - but that also means the images are going to be in the range of 4-5mb each. I think Fuji has discontinued this model. All in all this is a good performer at a really decent price. I have not had any regrets buying it and unlike my $900 Canon, this one has never failed to perform and has never disappointed. For a shot with flash, from the time you press the power button until it is ready to shoot with flash is in the realm of 3-4 seconds. From shoot to ready to shoot again with flash off is in the realm of 4-6 seconds. If Fuji were to come out with an updated camera with more mp, I would order it today, perhaps I should go look!

Reviews.Title: I love my new camera!
Reviews.Author: Alex Greenberg
Reviews.Content: What a nice little camera this is!  I take pictures whenever I go Kayaking ( or any outdoorsy thing ), and I've already killed a nice point-n-shoot.  I keep my Fuji around  my neck on a lanyard and squeeze off shots when I feel like it.  No more plastic bags, no more fumbling around in my drypack for a picture which won't wait.Picture quality is fine.  10mp, decent zoom, farly bright screen but what the heck, I got because it's rugged.Highly recommended! Perfect for out on the water.

Reviews.Title: Survived 5 Hours in a Pool
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: I've had one of these for 2 years now and it's an awesome camera.  It's taken excellent pictures (especially when backpacking up in the mountains) and has been used in and under the water countless times.  Recently I was at a water park and the camera came out of my pocket and fell to the bottom of the pool.  They wouldn't shut the slide down for me so I had to wait over five hours until the park closed; once I got the camera back it still works EXCELLENTLY.  Amazing purchase.

Reviews.Title: Finepix is GREAT for underwater pictures
Reviews.Author: CWW
Reviews.Content: I purchased the Finepix Z-33wp camera just before a trip to Dominica. I used it both in and out of the water. It is a great little camera. It took very nice pictures.

Reviews.Title: awsome!!!
Reviews.Author: cyote ugly
Reviews.Content: the only thing i wish this camera had was a optical zoom... took it swimming with manatees and got great pics and took it to a waterpark and had great picsthe only feature dislike i had was the multiple quick shots, it was a little slow and couldnt get it to keep all of them but i am still tinkering with thatlove this product with little kids as it has the gel case for it so no dings in the paint or anything and it is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Miss This Camera
Reviews.Author: Ymmij
Reviews.Content: I really miss this camera.I used the older model for years. It had a great digital zoom that got me DSLR quality macros. It also had a great action scene that shot crisp pictures at 70MPH. I had it submerged in a mountain creek for some awesome underwater shots. Unfortunately, it met its end in Destin, FL when the water leaked into the battery case. It still works, but the LCD is gone. My girlfriend has the upgraded model, I must put it through some tests to see how it measures to my old Z33.

Reviews.Title: small and portable
Reviews.Author: Shawn Blaesing-thompson "Abby's Mom"
Reviews.Content: I bought this is a second camera for banging around out side with the kiddos.  I wanted something that could fit in a pocket for those times I don't need super high quality photos.  This does the job, don't have to worry about it getting wet or dirty.  Just have to keep the lens cover clean.  The photo resolution isn't as good as my nicer camera, but for what I need it for it gets the job done.

Reviews.Title: orthodoc
Reviews.Author: OrthoDoc
Reviews.Content: The camera is very compact, and is easy to carry.  It is very easy to use, durable, and takes very good pictures.  Great camera for the beach, or other places where moisture may be a problem

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Bman
Reviews.Content: good quality easy to use. very fun to take pictures under water. you can take it anywhere. its small and compact. zoom could be better though

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm FinePix digital camera
Reviews.Author: gramgram
Reviews.Content: ordered for my granddaughter. very pleased with product,delivery,and all round service. Highly recommended!will use again.

Reviews.Title: horrible seller not recomended
Reviews.Author: amalin
Reviews.Content: the camera nice but have to send it back, because the clip for the strap it was broken and the ignore my efforts to get in touch with them , the seller horrible i will not recomended to anyone
